title: "Aurora CEO Chris Urmson to Discuss Advances in Self-driving With Axios at Industry Event"
excerpt: "Following Aurora Illuminated Investor & Analyst Days, leadership of self-driving company Aurora will speak at several industry events this week. The company - which announced earlier this summer its plans to merge with the special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) Reinvent Technology Partners Y (NASDAQ: RTPY) - expects to be listed on Nasdaq with the ticker symbol AUR before the end of the year."
